newsitem.title: INDIA: India temple fire death toll rises to at least 37.
newsitem.headline: India temple fire death toll rises to at least 37.

text.p: At least 37 people were killed and more than 50 injured on Saturday when fire crackers set on fire a famous temple in the southern Indian town of Thanjavur, police said.
"The death toll has risen to 37 and we expect more casualties," state director general of police K.K. Rajasekaran Nair told Reuters in the capital of Tamil Nadu state, Madras.
Police suspect many people burned to death while others died in a stampede after the fire broke out.
United News of India said a local festival was scheduled to be held in the Hindu temple on Sunday.
